attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to see a system of laws  in place where a venue such as a pub/club or other public building has the choice of smoking or non smoking,this would be a much better solution to the problem as opposed to the draconian measures implemented under current legislation. Most resteraunts/pubs etc prior to the smoking ban already had a non smoking policy in place which was respected by the patrons who smoked. this ban has already, or WILL severely affect buissness as a whole within the  licenced trade and others such as cafe's,which will have a negative effect on everyone smoker and non smoker alike, pub closures etc. This new law should have been subject to a referendum of the british people NOT forced upon everyone. I call upon the government to re-examine the current laws and consider an amendment of such laws.

government_responses.details:
